summary: Adds a new, craftable assassin arrow; retexture of the Dawnguard dragonbone arrow with modified stats  -Dawnguard required-
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new, craftable assassin arrow - uinder the MISC category; black & glowing red retexture of the Dawnguard dragonbone arrow and quiver; modified stats.  -Dawnguard required-

Arrow ignores normal resistance with 34.5 base damage plus a silent explosion of absorb health (25) over 5 seconds. Has a chance of knocking down NPCs. While it\'s powerful, it is not a one shot-one kill (well, not always).

If you\'d rather not gather the materials & craft them, just drop into console & help \"assassin arrow\" (with the quotes) to get the item code.

Use NexusModManager to install/uninstall
                      -or-
Extract assassinarrow.esp & assassinarrow.bsa to your Skyrim\\Data directory and check to activate in data files
Delete assassinarrow.esp & assassinarrow.bsa from your Skyrim\\Data dirtectory to uninstall

Plugin has been checked with TESEdit 3.0.26

Should be fine anywhere in your load order.
[center][youtube]BkoxiPDm2R8[/youtube][/center]
author: scrapperrm
